name: Sicko Sanctum Megahecks
description:
An infinite, wave-based, movement shooter that takes place in a surreal code hell. Your objective: get revenge and get far.  With the use of unlimited upgrades, it looks easy on the surface. But with harder-than-ever enemies, special stages, and now a final boss, it's a rough time!

This version over the free version has:

  1. From the ground up redone environment art
  2. All new upgrade system
  3. Redone stages/special stages
  4. A final boss
  5. A soundtrack
  6. More enemies
  7. And more!

Created by Jake Stevenson with the soundtrack done by Sean Tarantella
